title: The Wiggles: The big red car
creator_credit: Phillip Cullen, John Spence and ABC-TV (Australia)
brief_description: The Wiggles are just about everyone’s favourite group and guaranteed to have you rocking in the loungeroom together with the children. Features 15 “wriggly” tracks including the title track “Big red car”. The Wiggles are joined by their special friends Dorothy the dinosaur, Henry the octopus, Captain Feathersword and introduces Wags the dog.
